wd <- getwd()
this_set <- "src/images/character_design/"
files <- list.files(
    paste0(wd, "/", this_set)
)

for (f in files){
    cat(
        paste0(
            "![](",
            this_set,
            f,
            "){.lightbox style=\"column-span: none; border-radius: 20px;\" group=\"my-gallery\"}\n"
        )
    )
}
